about_the_game:
Reliable, simple, and powerful, the Soviet-made PPSH gives you all the spray and none of the pray. If you’re looking for a submachine gun with a fire rate that’s as demonic as the hordes you face, you’ve found it in this Russian classic!
This weapon bundle contains;
The PPSH submachine gun
2 charms (Russian Doll + Hammer/Sickle Badge)
2 bespoke weapon skins (Russian Flag + Russian Doll).
